definitions.definition: Any of a class of types of cancer affecting the blood cells , especially the white blood cells (usually with massive leukocytosis ), and the blood cell –forming ( hematopoietic ) tissues.
examples: The subjects suffered from lymphoblastic and myeloid leukemias .

main_definition: ( oncology , pathology ) Any of a class of types of cancer affecting the blood cells , especially the white blood cells (usually with massive leukocytosis ), and the blood cell –forming ( hematopoietic ) tissues.
